product_name: Seattle Sports Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield Case - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield Case combines a shock-absorbing neoprene outer with a waterproof liner sleeve. Use them separately or combine them for protection from shock and moisture.
short_description: The Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield Case combines a shock-absorbing neoprene outer with a waterproof liner sleeve. Use them separately or combine them for protection from shock and moisture.
